name: Monster Hunter: World - High Resolution Texture Pack
detailed_description:
Experience Monster Hunter: World like you've never seen it before with the High Resolution Texture Pack!

A minimum of 8 GB of graphic memory is required to install. High resolution textures will not display properly without sufficient graphic memory. Please make sure your PC meets system requirements before installing.
about_the_game:
Experience Monster Hunter: World like you've never seen it before with the High Resolution Texture Pack!

A minimum of 8 GB of graphic memory is required to install. High resolution textures will not display properly without sufficient graphic memory. Please make sure your PC meets system requirements before installing.
short_description: Experience Monster Hunter: World like you've never seen it before with the High Resolution Texture Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 3.20GHz or AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX Vega56
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/30fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or Intel® Core™ i3 8350 4GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080Ti or AMD Radeon™ VII
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 2160p／30fps
